alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 4:46AM CDT until May 11 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin...Iowa...Minnesota... Mississippi River at McGregor affecting Allamakee, Clayton, Crawford and Grant Counties. Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10 affecting Clayton and Grant Counties. Mississippi River at La Crosse affecting La Crosse, Vernon and Houston Counties. Mississippi River at Winona affecting Winona, Buffalo and Trempealeau Counties. Mississippi River at Wabasha affecting Wabasha and Buffalo Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 17.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 AM CDT Friday was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday morning and continue falling to 14.3 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.8 feet on 05/11/1954. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued later this morning.
